from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import os

# 创建图标目录
os.makedirs(''/Users/user/workspace/learn-ai/task04_chrome_favorite_lark/icons'', exist_ok=True)

# 创建不同尺寸的图标
sizes = [16, 32, 48, 128]
for size in sizes:
    img = Image.new(''RGBA'', (size, size), (59, 130, 246, 255))  # 蓝色背景
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
    
    # 绘制一个简单的书签形状
    padding = size // 8
    draw.rectangle([padding, padding, size-padding, size-padding*2], 
                  fill=(255, 255, 255, 255), outline=None)
    
    # 保存图标
    img.save(f''/Users/user/workspace/learn-ai/task04_chrome_favorite_lark/icons/icon{size}.png'')
    print(f''Created icon{size}.png'')
")
